name: WordClouds.com Save File
summary: A WCLD2 file contains a saved word cloud created by WordClouds.com, an online program for generating custom word clouds. It stores all of the information about the word cloud, including a list of words, font, colors, shape, text shadows, and spacing. When a user saves a word cloud, WordClouds.com automatically downloads information about it as a WCLD2 file; users can upload the file to the site to open it.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
